comunitario donde rendimientos se distribuyen equitativamente entre miembros  IMPORTANTE: En Mezo, BTC es NATIVO (como ETH en Ethereum) - Los usuarios env\u00edan BTC via msg.value (funciones payable) - BTC tiene 18 decimales en Mezo (no 8 como BTC real) - No se necesita WBTC, trabajamos directamente con BTC nativo  Caracter\u00edsticas: - M\u00faltiples usuarios aportan peque\u00f1as cantidades de BTC nativo - Pool alcanza tama\u00f1o \u00f3ptimo para DeFi yields - Rendimientos se reparten equitativamente - Permite entrada/salida flexible - Governanza simple por votaci\u00f3n","errors":{"AddressEmptyCode(address)":[{"details":"There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract)."}],"AddressInsufficientBalance(address)":[{"details":"The ETH balance of the joinPool(uint256).details: Usuario envía BTC con msg.value (función payable)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateMemberYield(uint256,address).notice: Calcula yields pendientes de un miembro

claimYield(uint256).notice: Reclamar yields acumulados sin salir del pool

closePool(uint256).notice: Cierra un pool (solo creador o owner)

getMemberInfo(uint256,address).notice: Obtiene información de un miembro en un pool

getPoolMembers(uint256).notice: Obtiene lista de miembros de un pool

getTotalShares(uint256).notice: Obtiene total de shares en un pool

joinPool(uint256).notice: Unirse a un pool cooperativo con BTC NATIVO

performanceFee().notice: Performance fee del protocolo (1% = 100 basis points)

poolMembers(uint256,address).notice: Mapping de pool ID => miembro => info

poolMembersList(uint256,uint256).notice: Mapping de pool ID => array de direcciones de miembros

pools(uint256).notice: Mapping de pool ID a pool info
